behaviorVariables.json_comment: Influence Factor Weight for preferring moving less.
Influence Factor Weight for preferring higher elevations.
Influence Factor Weight to control the desire to be inside water.
Influence Factor Weight to control the desire to be inside water WHEN SPRINTING.
A weight for an influence factor to prefer to get inside melee range. Negative values will encourage units to get out of melee range.
A weight for an influence factor to prefer to get inside melee range WHEN SPRINTING. Negative values will encourage units to get out of melee range.
If my move would not result in being able to fire, should I rewrite that move as a sprint?
Radius (in meters) to avoid sprinting within.
Minimum number of stealth pips to allow for an ECM ghosted mech to fire weapons
Influence Factor Weight to control the desire to be in locations with higher melee to-hit penalty.
Influence Factor Weight to control the desire to be in locations with higher melee to-hit penalty WHEN SPRINTING.
